notes: ok only with animate subject if the speaker takes an external perspective

Adjectival suffix. Citation form: -DIr
(consultant’s comment: -dir is weaker than -mali-)
Preference for the “-DIR”less version. Intuition: “-DIR” somehow weakens the statement
_ is either a or e, determined by vowel harmony

evidence: tur-modal-evid8, tur-modal-evid8b, tur-modal-evid9, tur-modal-evid10, tur-modal-evid10b, tur-modal-evid11

notes: yok is negative existential rather than negator. Sometimes interchangeable with var.
